Topic.Title: I've been gone for a while.

Posts.EditableText: Ok, nobody missed me, but i will still explain why i've been gone for a while. I gathered up a team of people to help develop a 2D graphical MMORPG game. The game is called Medieval Magic, and has already passed it's beta stage. In 3 days the game got a total of 22 accounts, which is pretty good going. We are adding loads of new features, and it's going pretty well. The new website is being created, and you can visit it at... http://www.medmagic.squiggleuk.com Should be a pretty good and popular game. hope to see you there
Posts.HTML:
Ok, nobody missed me, but i will still explain why i've been gone for a while. I gathered up a team of people to help develop a 2D graphical MMORPG game.

The game is called Medieval Magic, and has already passed it's beta stage. In 3 days the game got a total of 22 accounts, which is pretty good going.
